room_title: Escape room "The Game Room" by Houdini's Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: Our first escape room ever and we are hooked. We all cannot wait to go back for the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Game Room" by Houdini's Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: We escaped Houdini's Parlor and had so much fun doing so. We were matched up with another group of 5 and it was great collaborating - everyone had their own strengths that helped. The puzzles were challenging and we will definitely go back to escape another room!

room_title: Escape room "The Game Room" by Houdini's Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: Loved it! Especially because we escaped!!! Good clean fun for all!!! Highly recommend it!! We're lucky to have it here in our city!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Game Room" by Houdini's Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: This was our second escape room and our favorite so far. The theme and riddles where right on. You dont feel like a puzzle is impossible or at a lose. Flows really well. They did a great job setting up the room and some interesting ways to find some clues. Super amazing. I hope we go back to try another room.

room_title: Escape room "The Game Room" by Houdini's Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: This was one of the most fun experiences of my life!! It was so well designed and engages you without making you feel like you are doing mental "work"! Everything was perfect! 10/10 would recommend!

room_title: Escape room "The Game Room" by Houdini's Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: We had an amazing time in the game room. We didn't realize it was the hardest challenge and still did great...almost had it! I cannot wait to go back. The owner and his staff were super nice! It was clean and smelled good also!

room_title: Escape room "The Game Room" by Houdini's Room Escape in Cincinnati
review: It was an awesome night, and so much fun! It's a genuine challenge and you have to think and work together to get it done. The staff was super nice also. Excited to go back and do the other rooms!
